title: The Living Archive
outcome: Citizens piece together Halden’s memory fragments from digital leaks, puzzle clues, and whistleblower files. The emerging evidence reveals Halden deliberately engineered his own downfall to expose Council corruption. Mass gatherings allow citizens to hold spontaneous public courts, leading to a surge for truth and justice. The Council’s cover-up efforts collapse, forever reshaping city politics.

events.description: Crowdsourcing efforts retrieve deleted files, voice snippets, and logs tied to Halden. Puzzle clues and data leaks join with citizens' testimony to reconstruct his memory archive.
The Council panics as evidence mounts Halden orchestrated the BCI's collapses to reveal corruption. Security tries, unsuccessfully, to scrub damning fragments from public feeds.
People gather outside Tower 9 replaying Halden’s recovered messages. Grassroots courts debate the fate of Council members accused in the cover-up and suppression.
The Council fractures as whistleblowers confess live to manipulating BCI scores and erasing citizens. Former 'invisible' citizens gain rallying support, demanding a new system.
With the Council in disarray, citizen assemblies assume decision-making powers. The Living Archive goes public, and Stenograd’s next chapter is rewritten by collective will.
